sql_statement.static: CREATE TABLE MethRfc3918ScaledGrpFwd_WestPortGroupHandles AS SELECT Handle As Handle, Location As Location FROM Port WHERE Handle IN (SELECT RelationTable.SourceHnd FROM RelationTable WHERE TargetHnd = (SELECT Tag.Handle FROM Tag WHERE Name = 'West_Port_Group') AND RelationTable.Type = 'UserTag')

CREATE TABLE MethRfc3918ScaledGrpFwd_EastPortGroupHandles AS SELECT Handle As Handle, Location As Location FROM Port WHERE Handle IN (SELECT RelationTable.SourceHnd FROM RelationTable WHERE TargetHnd = (SELECT Tag.Handle FROM Tag WHERE Name = 'East_Port_Group') AND RelationTable.Type = 'UserTag')

CREATE TABLE MethRfc3918ScaledGrpFwd_SouthPortGroupHandles AS SELECT Handle As Handle, Location As Location FROM Port WHERE Handle IN (SELECT RelationTable.SourceHnd FROM RelationTable WHERE TargetHnd = (SELECT Tag.Handle FROM Tag WHERE Name = 'South_Port_Group') AND RelationTable.Type = 'UserTag')

SELECT * FROM MethRfc3918ScaledGrpFwd_TestOptionParam
CREATE TABLE ExpectedRxStreamResults (StreamId INTEGER, FrameCount INTEGER, TxPortLocation TEXT, Handle INTEGER, RxPortLocation TEXT)

INSERT INTO ExpectedRxStreamResults SELECT tx.StreamId, tx.FrameCount, (SELECT Location FROM Port WHERE Handle = tx.ParentHnd), prt.Handle, prt.Location FROM TxEotStreamResults AS tx INNER JOIN MethRfc3918ScaledGrpFwd_EastPortGroupHandles AS prt
CREATE TABLE EotStreamResults (TxPortLocation TEXT, TxFrames INTEGER, RxFrames INTEGER, FrameLoss INTEGER, OutSeqFrameCount INT, MaxLatency FLOAT, RxPortLocation TEXT)

INSERT INTO EotStreamResults SELECT (SELECT Location FROM Port WHERE Handle = tx.ParentHnd), tx.FrameCount, (rx.FrameCount - rx.DuplicateFrameCount), (tx.FrameCount - (rx.FrameCount - rx.DuplicateFrameCount)), rx.OutSeqFrameCount , rx.MaxLatency, (SELECT Location FROM MethRfc3918ScaledGrpFwd_EastPortGroupHandles WHERE Handle=rx.ParentHnd) FROM TxEotStreamResults AS tx INNER JOIN RxEotStreamResults AS rx WHERE tx.StreamId=rx.Comp32 AND rx.IsExpectedPort=1

INSERT INTO EotStreamResults SELECT TxPortLocation, FrameCount, 0, FrameCount, 0, NULL, RxPortLocation FROM ExpectedRxStreamResults WHERE StreamId NOT IN (SELECT Comp32 FROM RxEotStreamResults) OR (StreamId IN (SELECT Comp32 FROM RxEotStreamResults) AND Handle NOT IN (SELECT ParentHnd FROM RxEotStreamResults))
SELECT * FROM EotStreamResults

sql_statement.static: SELECT * FROM MethRfc3918ScaledGrpFwd_TestOptionParam
SELECT * FROM MethRfc3918ScaledGrpFwd_CriteriaParam
SELECT * FROM MethRfc3918ScaledGrpFwd_EastPortGroupHandles
CREATE TABLE ExpectedRxStreamResults (StreamId INTEGER, FrameCount INTEGER, TxPortLocation TEXT, Handle INTEGER, RxPortLocation TEXT)

INSERT INTO ExpectedRxStreamResults SELECT tx.StreamId, tx.FrameCount, (SELECT Location FROM Port WHERE Handle = tx.ParentHnd), prt.Handle, prt.Location FROM TxEotStreamResults AS tx INNER JOIN MethRfc3918ScaledGrpFwd_EastPortGroupHandles AS prt
CREATE TABLE EotStreamResults (TxPortLocation TEXT, TxFrames INTEGER, RxFrames INTEGER, ForwardingRate INTEGER, RxPortLocation TEXT)

INSERT INTO EotStreamResults SELECT (SELECT Location FROM Port WHERE Handle = tx.ParentHnd), tx.FrameCount, (rx.FrameCount - rx.DuplicateFrameCount), CAST(((rx.FrameCount - rx.DuplicateFrameCount)/((rx.LastArrivalTime - rx.FirstArrivalTime)/1000000)) AS INTEGER), (SELECT Location FROM MethRfc3918ScaledGrpFwd_EastPortGroupHandles WHERE Handle=rx.ParentHnd) FROM TxEotStreamResults AS tx INNER JOIN RxEotStreamResults AS rx WHERE tx.StreamId=rx.Comp32 AND rx.IsExpectedPort=1

INSERT INTO EotStreamResults SELECT TxPortLocation, FrameCount, 0, 0, RxPortLocation FROM ExpectedRxStreamResults WHERE StreamId NOT IN (SELECT Comp32 FROM RxEotStreamResults) OR (StreamId IN (SELECT Comp32 FROM RxEotStreamResults) AND Handle NOT IN (SELECT ParentHnd FROM RxEotStreamResults))
SELECT * FROM MethRfc3918ScaledGrpFwd_CurrentIteration
UPDATE MethRfc3918ScaledGrpFwd_CurrentIteration SET OfferedLoadRate=(SELECT Sum(FrameCount) FROM TxEotStreamResults)/(SELECT TestDuration FROM MethRfc3918ScaledGrpFwd_TestOptionParam)
UPDATE MethRfc3918ScaledGrpFwd_CurrentIteration SET TxFrames=(SELECT Sum(FrameCount) FROM TxEotStreamResults)
UPDATE MethRfc3918ScaledGrpFwd_CurrentIteration SET RxFrames=(SELECT Sum(RxFrames) FROM EotStreamResults)
UPDATE MethRfc3918ScaledGrpFwd_CurrentIteration SET ForwardingRate=(SELECT Sum(ForwardingRate) FROM EotStreamResults)

UPDATE MethRfc3918ScaledGrpFwd_CurrentIteration SET Verdict=(SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT ForwardingRate FROM MethRfc3918ScaledGrpFwd_CurrentIteration) < (SELECT MinimumFwdRateThld FROM MethRfc3918ScaledGrpFwd_CriteriaParam) THEN 'FAIL' ELSE 'PASS' END)
